snippet.title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard | Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
"These are the times in which legends are born, or slain." Return to Thedas in Dragon Age™: The Veilguard. 
 
Solas's ritual is interrupted - but at what cost? The corrupt Elven gods have broken free and are hellbent on blighting the world. It's up to you to unite the Veilguard and fight back against these ancient rulers.

Dragon Age™: The Veilguard arrives October 31, 2024. Pre-order* to receive the Blood Dragon armor cosmetic for all three classes: Warrior, Mage, and Rogue: https://go.ea.com/DATVPreOrder
 
Follow us on:
 
X: https://www.twitter.com/dragonage
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonAge
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dragonagegame
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@dragonagegame
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@electronicarts
Tumblr: https://www.tumblr.com/bioware
Discord: Discord.gg/BioWare
 
*Conditions & restrictions apply. See ea.com/games/dragon-age/dragon-age-the-veilguard/disclaimers for details.
